content: Welcome to your new project! I can help you edit it however you want. What would you like to do?

Substitute this with a frontend component for the staking contract at 0x0744d79f3e8f0a3652d886c9c49cb 476a05de248 on polygon. It requires users to have TestToken to approve amount before staking. The TestToken address is 0x2c87f28573824f65f75c8a0437f44 4605214ae41Substitute this with a frontend component for the staking contract at 0x0744d79f3e8f0a3652d886c9c49cb 476a05de248 on polygon.
